org.apache.giraph.partition

类 RangeSplitHint<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.partition.RangeSplitHint<I>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex index to split around
    所有已实现的接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class RangeSplitHint<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable>
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable
    Hint to the RangeMasterPartitioner about how a RangePartitionOwner can be split.
